name: 侯赛因·库瓦杰瓦拉
name_full: 侯赛因·库瓦杰瓦拉 Hussain Kuwajerwala
introduction: Hussain Kuwajerwala started off his career with ads, moving on to TV shows. His popular roles include Chirag in Kyunki saas bhi kabhi bahu thi, Sumit in Kumkum and Arjun in Krishna Arjun. From a Tv soap actor, he moved on to participating in Nach Baliye with his real life baliye, Tina Kuwajerwala and won the show & millions of hearts. Hussain also anchored a lot of shows like India Idol, Dance Premiere League, Shabaash India and Nach Baliye.From acting and anchoring, Hussain moved on to a musical Zangoora, staged at Kingdom of dreams in Gurgaon. He made his debut in Bollywood with the sci-fi movie Shree, released on April 26, 2013.
